tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LeadHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    status_change_time TIMESTAMP,
    previous_status VARCHAR(50),
    new_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES LeadStatus(lead_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lead_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    tracking_date DATE,
    tracking_location VARCHAR(100),
    tracking_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lead_statuses (lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 status VARCHAR,
 last_updated TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE lead_history (lead_id INT,
 status VARCHAR,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES lead_statuses(lead_id))

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR,
 email VARCHAR,
 role VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE user_activity (user_id INT,
 activity_type VARCHAR,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id))

CREATE TABLE lead_history (
  history_id INT,
  lead_id INT,
  old_status TEXT,
  new_status TEXT,
  updated_by TEXT,
  update_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lead_notes (
  note_id INT,
  lead_id INT,
  note TEXT,
  created_by TEXT,
  creation_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lead_metrics (
  metric_id INT,
  lead_id INT,
  metric_name TEXT,
  metric_value FLOAT,
  measurement_time TIMESTAMP
);
